import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function SignInForm() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); async function configuration(event) { event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8080/login', {email, password}) } return (

setDescription(event.target.value)}/> ={email} onChange={event => event.target.value} />

) } export default SignInForm;
